description: Hard-coded WotLK 3.3.5a stat priorities, caps, and resilience logic.

hit_rating.note: 5% Hit needed for PvP. 4% for Spells if you have talents.

spell_penetration.note: 75 negates Mark of the Wild. 130 negates Paladin Auras / Shadow Protection.

resilience.note: Diminishing returns start hitting hard after 1414 (Season 8 Gear max).

gear_swapping_rules.battlegrounds: Maximize Stamina and Resilience. Survival is key for flag spinning.
gear_swapping_rules.arena: Balance Resilience with Burst Stats (Armor Pen/Haste). Glass cannon builds viable in 2v2.
gear_swapping_rules.duels: Counter-gearing allowed (e.g., Shadow Resist gear vs Warlocks).
